description: Ancient Greek γνωμολογία (gnōmología) from γνώμη (gnṓmē, “judgement, maxim”) + λογία (logía, “collection”) (from λέγω (légō, “gather, pick up”), see anthology). Compare French gnomologie.

entries.meaning: (obsolete) A collection of, or a treatise on, maxims, grave sentences, or reflections.
